I'm Chris Walsh, and I'm a

About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do.

Your project is in safe hands.

As a developer assistant and software tester at my company, I've learned and worked extensively with modern full-stack technologies like JavaScript, Bootstrap, PHP, and MySQL. I work with other developers to introduce new features and maintain utilities on multiple web applications with thousands of users that process over 100,000 transactions annually. I also have work experience in education and customer service where I fostered soft skills like written and verbal communication, collaboration, leadership, and adaptability.

I specialize in full-stack web development and software testing using languages and technologies like HTML5, CSS3, SASS, SQL and JS - along with the most popular libraries and frameworks for these languages. As a tester, I'm familiar with automated testing using Selenium Java and centralized project management systems like Jira.

I Specialize In

Creating and testing beautiful web applications with modern technologies.

Coding

My knowledge of modern, widely-used technologies such as Git Version Control, Java, MySQL, JavaScript, Python, and SASS allow me to use relevant technologies to produce extraordinary, scalable, modular code. Some examples of this can be found on my work page!

Testing

I have a strong background in manual and automated QA testing. My knowledge of automated test scripting with Selenium, centralized PM systems such as Jira, and the Agile software development cycle allow me to function as a great tester - and also as a developer who values designing and creating programs of high quality.

Problem Solving

I enjoy working with a headstrong team of engineers, testers, and project managers to solve difficult problems. When people come together in technology to tackle an issue and create a powerful product, we can change the course of history. I thrive on solving problems to create better products - a small but important puzzle piece in that mission.

Cross-Disciplinary Skills

As a political science graduate, I bring cross-disciplinary skills that I've gained from my tenure at the University of Florida including but not limited to strong verbal/written communication, conflict resolution, mediation, and ethical philosophy.
